de.kaleidox.javacord.util.commands

Annotation Type Command


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Command

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] aliases
      Defines aliases for the command.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      Defines the description that is shown in the default help command.
      boolean enablePrivateChat
      Defines whether this command should be usable in a private chat.
      boolean enableServerChat
      Defines whether this command should be usable in a server chat.
      int requireChannelMentions
      Defines the minimum amount of channel mentions required for the command to run.
      org.javacord.api.entity.permission.PermissionType requiredDiscordPermission
      Defines a permission that the user is required to have be in the executing context; e.g. the ServerTextChannel.
      int requireRoleMentions
      Defines the minimum amount of role mentions required for the command to run.
      int requireUserMentions
      Defines the minimum amount of user mentions required for the command to run.
      boolean shownInHelpCommand
      Defines whether the command is shown in the default help command.
      java.lang.String usage 

    • Element Detail

      • aliases

        public abstract java.lang.String[] aliases
        Defines aliases for the command. Must not contain null.
        Returns:
        The aliases of the command.

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Defines the description that is shown in the default help command.
        Returns:
        The description of the command.
        Default:
        "No description provided."

      • usage

        public abstract java.lang.String usage
        Default:
        "No usage provided."

      • shownInHelpCommand

        public abstract boolean shownInHelpCommand
        Defines whether the command is shown in the default help command. Default value is TRUE.
        Returns:
        Whether to list this command in the default help command.
        Default:
        true

      • enablePrivateChat

        public abstract boolean enablePrivateChat
        Defines whether this command should be usable in a private chat. Default value is true.
        Returns:
        Whether this command is available in private chat.
        Default:
        true

      • enableServerChat

        public abstract boolean enableServerChat
        Defines whether this command should be usable in a server chat. Default value is true.
        Returns:
        Whether this command is available in server chat.
        Default:
        true

      • requiredDiscordPermission

        public abstract org.javacord.api.entity.permission.PermissionType requiredDiscordPermission
        Defines a permission that the user is required to have be in the executing context; e.g. the ServerTextChannel. Default value is PermissionType.SEND_MESSAGES.
        Returns:
        The required permission to execute this command.
        Default:
        org.javacord.api.entity.permission.PermissionType.SEND_MESSAGES

      • requireChannelMentions

        public abstract int requireChannelMentions
        Defines the minimum amount of channel mentions required for the command to run. Default value is 0.
        Returns:
        The minimum required amount of channel mentions.
        Default:
        0

      • requireUserMentions

        public abstract int requireUserMentions
        Defines the minimum amount of user mentions required for the command to run. Default value is 0.
        Returns:
        The minimum required amount of user mentions.
        Default:
        0

      • requireRoleMentions

        public abstract int requireRoleMentions
        Defines the minimum amount of role mentions required for the command to run. Default value is 0.
        Returns:
        The minimum required amount of role mentions.
        Default:
        0
